content: धरण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [धृ-युच्] Bearing, preserving, holding, &c. --णः {@--1@} A ridge of land serving the purpose of a bridge; the side of a mountain. {@--2@} The world. {@--3@} The sun. {@--4@} The female breast. {@--5@} Rice, corn. {@--6@} The Himālaya, (as king of mountains). --णं {@--1@} Supporting, sustaining, upholding; सारं धरित्रीधरणक्षमं च <ls>Ku. 1. 17</ls>; धरणिधरणकिणचक्रगरिष्ठे <ls>Gīt. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Possessing, bringing, procuring, &c. {@--3@} Prop, stay, support. {@--4@} Security. {@--5@} A measure of weight equal to ten {%palas%}.
